__TOC__



We were responsible for the training of 1st year Electronics students @ Cairo University Faculty of Engineering.
The event started on the 3rd of July 2010 and ended on the 8th of July 2010.

Estimated no. of students: 250

* Ahmed Toulan (Instructor)

* Mahmoud Mohamed (Material preparation)

'''CECE Group''' in the faculty contributed with more instructors, burning DVDs and materials printout
